data.name: Business Debit Master Card
data.description: Keep track of business purchases and cash withdrawals, with a debit card linked to your business bank account.

features.additionalInfo: Pay anywhere worldwide : wherever Mastercard is accepted
Withdraw business cash worldwide : No ATM withdrawal fee at over 50,000 ATMs around the world via the  Global ATM Alliance and partner ATMs.
No annual fee : other fees and charges may apply
Fraud detection : 24/7 transaction monitoring for irregular or suspicious activity for protection and peace of mind
Tap and go : to speed up business purchases under $100
Lock your card: Avoid the hassle of immediately cancelling a mislaid card - by putting a temporary block on it in Online Banking or the Westpac App.
Your Business Debit Mastercard can be linked to up to two of these Westpac business bank accounts: Business One, Business One Plus and Community Solutions One.
Versatility : Provide employees with full or limited access cards to your business account.
Visibility : View individual cardholder transactions (identifiable by card number) on a single bank statement.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.

Security : The Westpac Fraud Money Back Guarantee ensures that any unauthorised transaction claims will be reimbursed provided the cardholder has not contributed to the loss and has contacted us promptly.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Business Debit Mastercard holders and all signatories need to be at least 18 years of age and identified Westpac customer
Account holder, signatory, or nominated by the account holder to receive a card

eligibility.additionalValue: Operating in Australia with an Australian address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Needs an eligible business account in the name of the account holder, to link the card.

fees.name: Annual Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is no annual fee for using the Business Debit Mastercard.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A 3% Westpac Foreign Transaction Fee applies to overseas debit or credit card withdrawals.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A 2% cash advance fee applies to credit card withdrawals where the 'Credit' option is selected.
